content.content:
lost art is a creative agency specialising in art direction, design & creative strategy services operating under the design direction of chris hopkins.

we aim to produce inspired & affecting work, with our portfolio spanning branding, advertising, packaging, publication, video, digital design & content creation.

it is more important for us to be undertaking meaningful work than it is to take on every new client we can. to discuss a project or for more information, please contact projects@lost-art.com
